romulo.gadelhaobfuscate@aluno.uece.br

I received my Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science from the Federal University of Ceará (UFC), Fortaleza, Brazil, in 2015. During my undergraduate studies, I was supported by the Brazilian agency CNPq. Currently, I’m pursuing a Master’s degree in Computer Science at the State University of Ceará (UECE). My recent research focuses on self-adaptive service-based systems. My research interests include mobile and ubiquitous computing, context-awareness, security in mobile systems, bioinformatics and machine learning.
